5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Abdur-Rahman bin ‘Abdin Al-Qari said:“I heard ‘Umar bin Khattab say: ‘The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever sleeps and misses his daily portion of Qur’an, or any part of it, let him read it between the Fajr prayer and the Zuhr prayer, and it will be recorded as if he had read it during the night.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ نَامَ عَنْ جُزْئِهِ، مِنَ اللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning one who sleeps and misses his daily portion of the Qur’an
